bibl.title: A New Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: The Hypothesis of Euripides' Alexandros. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 32.)
bibl.note: Cf. Idem, P. Oxy. ined.: The Hypothesis of Euripides, Alexandros, Akten des XIII. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses Marburg/Lahn 1971 (München, 1974) p. 89 [= P. Oxy. LII, 3650].
Coles Revel A., A New Oxyrhynchus Papyrus: The Hypothesis of Euripides' Alexandros. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 32.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1974, 4°, vii-70 pp. et VI pll.
